channel.title: Timeline of the City's History: 1888 on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline of the City's History: 1888 on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930

item.title: Derby Day at Washington Park
item.description: Derby Day at Washington Park–waiting for the start. Courtesy of “Chicago and Its Makers” (Chicago: Felix Mendelsohn, 1929). Other images from this year

item.title: On Their Way to the Derby
item.description: On their way to the Derby–coaching in the eighties. Courtesy of “Chicago and Its Makers” (Chicago: Felix Mendelsohn, 1929). Other images from this year
